attributes.action: Priority to house homeless British people before illegal immigrants in hotels
attributes.additional_details: Because these people are in Britain legally..can be identified and half of them have fought for this country!! Stop making illegal immigrants with no papers to identify them a priority!!
attributes.background: Stop prioritising illegal immigrants with no documents over British people who are homeless whether they be veterans or those that have fallen on hard times

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "All UK homeless citizens should be prioritised for hotel accommodation" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729887
